security_audit.summary: This skill makes targeted API calls to Replicate's image generation services and writes files only to the project's public/assets/images directory. Accesses REPLICATE_API_TOKEN from environment, which is standard practice for authenticated API calls.

content.user_title: Generate AI images for web components
content.value_statement: Creating visual assets for websites takes time and design skills. This skill uses FLUX 1.1 Pro AI to generate hero sections, feature images, and UI graphics with automatic enhancement. Images are optimized as WebP and saved directly to your project.
actual_capabilities: Generate images using FLUX 1.1 Pro AI model from text prompts
Create hero sections, feature showcases, and transformation graphics
Remove backgrounds for transparent foreground assets
Auto-detect existing image dimensions to maintain consistency
Enhance prompts with modern UI elements and design patterns
Save optimized WebP images to public/assets/images/
limitations: Requires REPLICATE_API_TOKEN environment variable to be set
Generates one image at a time (sequential processing)
Output is limited to WebP format only
Background removal uses separate bria/remove-background model

best_practices: Use specific subject descriptions in prompts for better AI interpretation
Let the script auto-enhance prompts - it adds professional styling automatically
Match existing image dimensions when replacing assets to maintain layout consistency
anti_patterns: Using overly generic prompts like 'make it look good' without specific subject
Requesting multiple asset types in a single prompt - generate each separately
Forgetting to set REPLICATE_API_TOKEN before running the skill

faq.question: Which AI models does this skill use?
faq.answer: Primary model is FLUX 1.1 Pro from Replicate for image generation. Optional bria/remove-background model is used for transparent assets.

faq.question: What image formats are supported?
faq.answer:: Output is always WebP format optimized for web performance. Aspect ratios supported include 1:1, 16:9, 4:3, 9:16, and 21:9.

faq.question: How do I integrate with my project?
faq.answer: Install dependencies with 'pnpm add replicate' and 'pnpm add sharp -D'. Set REPLICATE_API_TOKEN in your .env file before use.

faq.question: Is my data sent to external servers?
faq.answer: Images are generated via Replicate's API and temporarily stored on their servers. Final assets are saved only to your project's public directory.

faq.question: Why is my generation failing?
faq.answer: Common causes: missing REPLICATE_API_TOKEN, insufficient Replicate credits, network issues, or prompts violating content guidelines.

faq.question: How is this different from other image generators?
faq.answer: This skill is optimized for web components with automatic prompt enhancement, dimension matching, and direct file output to your project.
